<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=6253) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 185 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=238)

**Prerequisites**
[Archer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6252)

</column>

---

You draw your bow and attack with the same action. You Interact to draw a weapon from the [bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3) or [crossbow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=17) weapon group that is loaded or has [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), then Strike with that weapon.
name: Quick Shot
